description: Class numbers h(D) of imaginary quadratic fields with discriminant D=1-4*n.
comments: Also class number, or number of equivalence classes of positive definite binary quadratic forms of discriminant -(4n-1). - _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 28 2014
references: D. A. Buell, Binary Quadratic Forms. Springer-Verlag, NY, 1989, pages 19 and 224-230. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 28 2014
H. Cohen, Course in Computational Alg. No. Theory, Springer, 1993, pp. 514-5.
links: N. J. A. Sloane, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
author: Eric Rains (rains(AT)caltech.edu)
